modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod adds junk mail to mailboxes. Adverts for nearby traders to help find those closest in new towns or cities. Look inside mailboxes.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod adds junk mail to mailboxes. Adverts for nearby [traders](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-trader/) to help find those closest in new towns or cities. Look inside mailboxes to see if you can find an ad to your local traders.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/wolfbain5/7dtd-a18/tree/master/wolfbain5%20-%20Trader%20ad)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/14626-wolfbain5-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Wolfbain5](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/wolfbain5/)
